description: This requirement is for: The Department of National Defense (DND)",
full_summary:
**Call for Tender: Temporary Help Services [THS SA]**
=====================================================

**Public Tender Information**
---------------------------

*   Title: Temporary Help Services (THS SA) – One (1) “Special Advisor” in the National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Reference Number: cb-912-37077913
*   Solicitation Number: S4911501
*   Publication Date: 2024-04-29
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-01T11:00:00

**Notice Type**
---------------

This tender is specifically addressed to qualifying Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under EN578-172870, who hold a Special Advisor position in stream 13.9.

**Requirement Description**
------------------------

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking to engage a supplier for Temporary Help Services (THS SA) against the National Capital Region Supply Arrangement (NCR SA). The interest of the supplier is to fulfill the requirements of the Special Advisor position in Level of Security Requirement: SECRET.

**Supplier List**
----------------

The following Supply Arrangement (SA) holders are invited to submit a proposal:

1.  1019837 Ontario Inc.
2.  ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
3.  Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
4.  Akkada Professional Services Inc.
5.  Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
6.  Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
7.  ENET4S SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS LTD
8.  I4C INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CONSULTING INC
9.  Lionel Drouin
10. Maverin Inc.
11. Messa Computing Inc.
12. Nisha Technologies Inc.
13. Protak Consulting Group Inc.
14. T.I.7 Inc.
15. TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP./SOCIÉTÉ TEKSYSTEMS CANADA

**Document Link**
----------------

The full tender document is accessible via the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/36934/s4911501-rfp-for-competitive-method-1\_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/36934/s4911501-rfp-for-competitive-method-1\_1.pdf)
